Abubakar Mohammed


Abubakar Mohammed a.k.a. "Humble" was born on the 5th of April, 1998 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Alhaji Saeed and Hajia Hawa.

Career

He started his footballing career with Pana Spartan Academy

He had his basic education at Catholic Boys JHS, where he featured in school matches before continuing his studies at Asuansi Technical Institute (Cape Coast).

He currently plays for Islamic Golden Eleven; where he mostly feature as a left back or right back.

He enjoys playing football at his leisure time.
